title: AccuWeather: Weather Radar
whatsNew:
What’s New
Today Screen: With new Radar & Maps and AccuWeather Now modules, you can track the weather and watch live coverage without ever leaving the Today screen.

Radar & Maps: A reorganized menu makes finding and navigating maps nothing but smooth sailing.

Hurricane Tracker: Now it’s even easier to track the path of a storm and keep an eye on details like wind speed, rainfall, and storm surge. Because we know every minute counts.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

title: WeatherVane Home: Live Weather
whatsNew:
Hey there!
We’re excited to share our latest updates with you. Here’s what’s new in this release:
- New Widgets: You can now customize the weather information you want to see on your homescreen. Check out the weekly forecast, minimal forecast info, hourly updates, AQI information and more?we’ve added six new widgets for you to choose from.
- Forecast Icon: Easily access forecast updates with one tap from your homescreen.
Update your WeatherVane Home app and stay weather-ready, always!

We value your feedback! Email us at android.support@weather.com with any questions or suggestions.

title: Windy.app: Windy Weather Map
whatsNew:
Map bug fixed and more

Now the map zooms to the spot you were searching for as it should. We know it was annoying, our apologies.

Also, the phone widget is fixed -- for a little while, you couldn’t add it to your screen. Try it now - it's great for keeping an eye on the wind forecast for your favorite spots.

title: Today Weather: Alerts, Widgets

Version 2.1.1 Build 11:
- Minor bug fixes.

title: Ventusky: Weather Maps & Radar
whatsNew:
New map tiles for the highest zoom (in retina resolution).
Improved display of cities on maps
Bug fixes

Do you feel that? The breeze of the long-awaited update is finally blowing, bringing plenty of adjustments and an exciting novelty: the “Sea” section! It’s a blast for those living close to the sea and ocean or planning a vacation there: check available info on water temperature and more.
We also did fix some bugs and worked hard on performance and stability improvements.
Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.

title: How is the Weather?
whatsNew:

New: settings for the weather in the notification
